titles.title: Designating April 2, 1993, as "Education and Sharing Day, U.S.A.".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Mr. Wynn asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/15/1993--Introduced. Designates April 2, 1993, the birthday and the culmination of the celebration of the 90th birthday year of Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, leader of the worldwide Lubavitch movement, as Education and Sharing Day, U.S.A.
